enable-flag: Open about://flags and enable #experimental-web-platform-features to use Web Bluetooth.
browser-ble-support: Your browser does not support Web Bluetooth API. Please use a browser that supports it.
shutdown-message: Are you sure you want to shutdown the device?
charge-message: Are you sure you want to stop charging the device?
reboot-message: Are you sure you want to reboot the device?
info: Welcome to this Tool, you need to connect to the device via bluetooth first.
affiliate: This site is not affiliated with Ubiquiti in any way.
name: Name
module-read: Module EEPROM was read successfully, saving Data now.
module-saved: Module EEPROM was saved successfully from Wizard.
module-error: Unable to read Module, please unplug and plug it back in.
mac-failed: Unable to retrieve MAC Address, please try again.
reboot-success: Device will be rebooted in a few seconds...
name-message: Enter a new name for the device.
name-too-long: Your name is too long. Please enter a shorter name up to 28 characters.
name-unchanged: Device name unchanged because it is identical to the current name.
